options_receive_app_notifications.message: 应用程序更新时接收桌面通知

options_improve_configurator.message: 将匿名使用情况数据发送给开发团队

autoConnectEnabled.message: 自动连接：开启 - 配置器会自动连接新发现的端口

autoConnectDisabled.message: 自动连接: 禁用 - 用户需要选择正确的串行端口, 然后单击“连接”按钮。

deviceRebooting.message: 设备 - 重新启动

backupFileIncompatible.message: 抱歉，提供的备份文件是为先前版本的配置工具生成的，并且与该版本的配置工具不兼容。

backupFileUnmigratable.message: 抱歉，提供的备份文件是由配置工具的早期版本生成的，不可迁移。

configMigrationFrom.message: 迁移配置工具生成的配置文件: $1

configMigratedTo.message: 将配置迁移到配置工具: $1

configMigrationSuccessful.message: 配置迁移完成，迁移已应用: $1

serialPortOpened.message: 打开串口成功 ID: $1

serialPortOpenFail.message: 打开串口失败

serialPortClosedFail.message: 关闭串口失败

serialUnrecoverable.message: 串口连接故障 且无法恢复，正在断开连接……

usbDeviceOpened.message: 打开 USB 设备 成功 ID: $1

usbDeviceOpenFail.message: 打开 USB 设备 失败

usbDeviceClosed.message: 关闭 USB 设备 成功

usbDeviceCloseFail.message: 关闭 USB 设备 失败

usbDeviceUdevNotice.message: udev rules有没有正确安装？详细信息请查阅文档。

stm32AddressLoadFailed.message: 定位选项字节扇区失败，很可能是因为读取保护造成的。

stm32AddressLoadUnknown.message: 因未知错误，定位选项字节扇区失败。正在中止。

noConfigurationReceived.message: 10秒内没有接收到配置信息，飞控通信失败

firmwareVersionNotSupported.message: 不支持此固件版本，此地面站仅支持 $1 到 $2 (不包括)

firmwareVariantNotSupported.message: 不支持此固件版本， 请更新到INAV支持固件。 刷新之前请使用CLI命令备份，CLI 备份/还原 命令请参考文档

tabSwitchConnectionRequired.message: 在查看任何页面信息之前，你需要先连接

tabSwitchWaitForOperation.message: 不能执行当前操作，请等待上一个操作完成…

tabSwitchUpgradeRequired.message: 需要更新到最新版本的 iNavFlight 固件才能使用 $1 页面.

fcInfoReceived.message: 飞控信息，识别名: $1, 版本: $2

dfu_connect_message.message: 请使用固件烧写器来访问 DFU 设备

dfu_erased_kilobytes.message: 擦除 $1 kB 闪存 成功

dfu_device_flash_info.message: 检测到闪存空间为 $1 kiB

dfu_error_image_size.message: 错误: 固件文件大于飞控芯片的闪存。固件大小: $1 kiB, 上限 = $2 kiB

defaultWelcomeIntro.message: 欢迎使用INAV - Configurator, 为简化固件升级，设置和调校飞控而生的工具。

defaultWelcomeText.message:
本应用支持所有能运行 INAV (Matek F405-WING, Matek F722-SE 等诸多)。提供了推荐硬件的完整列表 点击.

固件源代码可以从以下位置下载点击
可用最新的固件地址 点击.

最新CP210x Drivers从以下位置下载点击
最新STM USB VCP Drivers从以下位置下载点击
最新ZadigWindows DFU驱动安装可以从从以下位置下载点击
最新中文版本InavConfigurator地面站可以从以下位置下载点击

defaultContributingText.message:
如果您想帮助提高INAV的水平，则可以通过多种方式提供帮助，包括:
  • 在论坛和IRC上回答其他用户的问题。
  • 向 固件和配置程序-新功能，修复，改进
  • 测试新功能/修复 and providing feedback.
  • 帮助解决 对问题和功能请求进行评论

defaultChangelogHead.message: 配置工具 - 变更日志

defaultDonateText.message:
此应用程序是完全开源的，并且对所有INAV用户免费。
如果INAV或INAV Configurator有用，请考虑通过捐款支持其发展。

initialSetupBackupAndRestoreApiVersion.message: 备份和还原功能已禁用您的固件API版本为$1, 如果需要备份和还原$2，请通过CLI命令备份您的设置, 详情请参阅INAV文档。

initialSetupCalibrateAccelText.message: 加速度计的6点校准。 转到Wiki for iNav并遵循传感器校准以获取更多信息

initialSetupCalibrateMagText.message: 将飞行器在所有轴向上都移动至少360度，你有30秒的时间可供进行这项操作。

initialSetupBackupRestoreText.message: 在 CLI 命令行中使用 'dump' 命令来备份你的设置以防意外丢失，注意CLI命令行设置 没有 包括在内。

initialSetupButtonResetZaxis.message: 重置 Z 轴，补偿：0 度

initialSetupButtonResetZaxisValue.message: 重置 Z 轴，补偿：$1 度

initialSetupBatteryDetectedCells.message: 电池检测到的电池计数:

initialSetupAccelCalibEnded.message: 加速度计校准完成

RX_SERIAL.message: 串行数字接收机（SPEKSAT, SBUS, SUMD）

RX_MSP.message: MSP接收机(通过MSP端口进行控制)

featureTX_PROF_SEL.message: 使用TX Stick命令选择配置文件

featureBAT_PROFILE_AUTOSWITCH.message: 自动电池配置文件选择

featureBAT_PROFILE_AUTOSWITCHTip.message: 插入电池后，根据电池电压自动选择电池配置文件

featureTHR_VBAT_COMPTip.message: 自动补偿电池放电时的电压压降，以使推力相对于油门保持恒定

featureSOFTSERIALTip.message: 开启后，请在串口页面设置串口。

featureREVERSIBLE_MOTORS.message: 可逆电机模式（用于可逆电调）

featureONESHOT125Tip.message: 开启前请务必拔掉电池，卸下螺旋桨。

featurePWM_OUTPUT_ENABLETip.message: INAV需要将此选项启用才能将信号发送到电调。 这是一项安全预防措施，可防止在飞行控制器闪烁后损坏舵机系统。

featureBLACKBOXTip.message: 打开后，请在黑盒日志页面完成设置。

featureCHANNEL_FORWARDING.message: 转发 Aux 通道信号到舵机输出

featureTRANSPONDERTip.message: 开启后，请在比赛应答器页面完成设置。

featurePWM_SERVO_DRIVERTip.message: 使用外部PCA9685 PMW驱动程序可将多达16个伺服器连接到飞行控制器。 必须连接PCA9685才能启用此功能。

featureRSSI_ADCTip.message: RSSI是信号强度的度量，非常方便，因此您可以知道飞机何时超出范围或是否受到RF干扰。

featureFW_LAUNCH.message: 永久启用固定翼的发射模式

featureDYNAMIC_FILTERSTip.message: 使用自动FFT陀螺仪分析来设置陷波滤波器以衰减陀螺仪噪声。 应该一直启用！

serialrx_inverted.message: 串行端口反转（与协议默认值相比）

configurationFeaturesHelp.message:
注意： 不是所有的功能都能同时被启用。当飞控检测到有冲突时会禁用相应的功能。
注意： 先 设置串口，再启用需要用到串口的功能。

configurationSerialRXHelp.message: 注意： 使用串行接收机时，请选择串口接收机类型，并在串口页面设置相应的串口。

configurationAutoDisarmDelay.message: [秒] 后锁定电机（需要启用 MOTOR_STOP）

configurationAutoDisarmDelayHelp.message: 仅用于摇杆布防（即不使用开关）

configurationThrottleMinimum.message: 最小油门（解锁时飞控输出给电调的最低油门数值）

configurationThrottleMid.message: 油门中位[遥控输入中间值]

configurationThrottleMaximum.message: 最大油门（飞控发给电调的最大值）

configurationThrottleMinimumCommand.message: 电调命令最小值（锁定时飞控发给电调的数值）

configurationVoltageSource.message: 用于报警和遥测的电压电源

configurationVoltageSourceHelp.message: 原始电压是直接从电池读取的电压。 压降补偿电压是电池在无负载时应达到的计算电压（模拟理想电池，并应消除高负载引起的虚假警报）

configurationBatteryCellsHelp.message: 将此设置为电池的电池数量以禁用自动电池计数检测或使电池配置文件的自动切换成为可能

configurationBatteryCellDetectVoltage.message: 用于电池计数检测的最大电池电压

configurationBatteryCellDetectVoltageHel.message: 用于电池计数自动检测的最大电池电压。 应高于最大电池电压，以考虑测量电压的可能漂移并保持电池计数检测的准确性

configurationCurrentScale.message: 按比例 [1/10 mV/A] 将电压缩放到毫安

configurationBatteryMultiwiiCurrent.message: 启用对传统 Multiwii MSP 电流计输出的支持

configurationGPSHelp.message: 注意： 使用GPS功能时，请记住要配置一个串行端口（通过”端口“页面）

configurationCraftNameHelp.message: 飞行器名称. 可以通过OSD和兼容的RC系统显示。

configurationVTXNoBandHelp.message: 图传频率已手动设置，选择一个频段将覆盖配置的频率。

configurationVTXPowerHelp.message: 图传功率等级。 以mw（或dBm）为单位的确切功率将取决于特定的硬件。 查看您的图传说明手册.

configurationVTXLowerPowerDisarmHelp.message: Enabling this option will make the VTX use its lowest power while the craft is disarmed. Use 'Until first arm' to make it use the lowest power only until you arm for the first time.

portsHelp.message: 注意： 不是所有的组合都是有效的，如果飞控检查到某组合不能同时工作，对应串口的设置将会被重置。

portsMSPHelp.message: 注意： 不要 关闭第一个串口的MSP选项。否则你可能要重新烧录固件并清空（丢失）所有设置。

portsFirmwareUpgradeRequired.message: 固件升级需要.

dtermSetpointWeightHelp.message: The lower the value, the more damped all the maneuvers are. 0 mean Dterm is computed from gyro, 1 from error and 2 from setpoint. For gentler feel lower the value. For sharper response, raise it

pidTuningMaxRollAngleHelp.message: Maximum ROLL angle in ANGLE mode. This also constrains the maximum bank in navigation modes.

pidTuningMaxPitchAngleHelp.message: Maximum PITCH angle in ANGLE mode. This also constrains the maximum climb and dive in navigation modes.

pidTuningMagHoldYawRateHelp.message: Maximum YAW rotation rate that MagHold controller can request from UAV. Used only when MagHold mode is enabled, during RTH and WAYPOINT navigation. Values below 30dps gives nice "cinematic" turns

loadedBatteryProfile.message: 加载电池配置文件: $1

receiverHelp.message:
请阅读文档中接收机章节。 配置串行端口 (如果需求), 接收机模式 (sbus/ppm/pwm), 提供程序 (用于串行接收器), 绑定接收机, 设置通道映射, 配置TX上的通道端点/范围，以便所有通道从 ~1000 to ~2000。 设置中点 (默认 1500), 将通道微调至 1500, 配置摇杆死区, 验证TX处于关闭或超出范围时的行为。
重要：快速阅读文档的“失控保护”一章并配置失控保护。

receiverHelpDeadband.message: These are values (in us) by how much RC input can be different before it's considered valid. For transmitters with jitter on outputs, this value can be increased if rc inputs twitch while idle.

receiverHelpYawDeadband.message: These are values (in us) by how much RC input can be different before it's considered valid. For transmitters with jitter on outputs, this value can be increased if rc inputs twitch while idle. This setting is for Yaw only.

receiverChannelMapTitle.message: 您可以通过在框内单击来定义自己的频道地图

auxiliaryHelp.message: 使用范围来定义遥控器上的开关和相应的模式分配，接收机通道给出一个范围最小/最大值之间的读数将激活该模式，记住要使用保存按钮保存设置。

adjustmentsHelp.message: Configure adjustment switches.  See the 'in-flight adjustments' section of the manual for details.  The changes that adjustment functions make are not saved automatically.  There are 4 slots.  Each switch used to concurrently make adjustments requires exclusive use of a slot.

adjustmentsExample1.message: Use Slot 1 and a 3POS switch on CH5 to select between Pitch/Roll P, I and D and another 3POS switch on CH6 to increase or decrease the value when held up or down.

adjustmentsExample2.message: Use Slot 2 and a 3POS switch on CH8 to select enable Rate Profile Selection via the same 3POS switch on the same channel.

adjustmentsFunction22.message: 手动 RC Expo 调参

adjustmentsFunction23.message: 手动 RC Yaw Expo 调参

adjustmentsFunction24.message: 手动 Pitch & Roll Rate 调参

adjustmentsFunction25.message: 手动 Roll 比率调参

adjustmentsFunction26.message: 手动 Pitch 比率调参

adjustmentsFunction27.message: 手动 Yaw 比率调参

adjustmentsFunction29.message: Navigation FW Pitch To Throttle Adjustment

adjustmentsFunction48.message: FW min thr down pitch angle Adjustment

transponderNotSupported.message: 该飞控不支持比赛收发器

transponderHelp.message: Configure your transponder code here. Note: Only valid codes will be recognised by race timing systems. Valid transponder codes can be obtained from Seriously Pro.

transponderInformation.message: Transponders systems allow race organizers to time your laps.  The transponder is fitted to your aircraft and when your aircraft passes the timing gate the track-side receiver registers your code and records your laptime.  When fitting an IR based transponder your should ensure that it points outward from your aircraft towards the track-side receivers and that the light beam is not obstructed by your airframe, battery-straps, cables, propellers, etc.

transponderDataInvalid.message: 收发器数据无效

servosChangeDirection.message: Change Direction in TX To Match

servoEmptyTableInfo.message: 未配置舵机。 使用“混控”选项卡添加它们。

motorsNotice.message:
电机测试方式注意：
移动滑块电机将自旋.
使用此功能前为了防止误伤请移除所有螺旋桨

motorsEnableControl.message: 我了解风险，请拆除螺旋桨-启用电动机控制。

sensorsInfo.message:
请注意，设置过高的图形刷新率会缩短尤其是笔记本电脑的电池使用时间。
建议只打开你感兴趣的传感器的图形显示并使用合理的刷新率

cliInfo.message:
注意：退出 CLI 页面或者点击断开连接将自动向飞控发送“退出”指令。在最新的固件中这将使飞控重启并且未保存的设置将会丢失。

警告：CLI中的某些命令可能导致电机输出引脚发出随机指令。如果连接电池，这有可能导致电机旋转。因此，强烈建议在 CLI 中输入命令之前确保未连接电池

cliInputPlaceholder.message: 在这里输入你的命令。按 Tab 可以进行自动填充。

cliSaveToFileFailed.message: 无法将命令行输出保存到文件

cliSaveToFileAborted.message: 将CLI命令输出保存到文件中失败

cliSaveToFileCompleted.message: 将CLI命令输出保存到文件中成功

cliConfirmSnippetNote.message: 注意：您可以在执行之前检查和编辑命令

loggingNote.message:
Data will be logged in this tab only, leaving the tab will cancel logging and application will return to its normal "configurator" state.
You are free to select the global update period, data will be written into the log file every 1 second for performance reasons.

loggingErrorOneProperty.message: Please select at least one property to log

blackboxNotSupported.message: Your flight controller's firmware does not support Blackbox logging or Blackbox feature is not enabled

serialLoggingSupportedNote.message: You can log to an external logging device (such as an OpenLog or compatible clone) by using a serial port. Configure the port on the Ports tab.

sdcardNote.message: Flight logs can be recorded to your flight controller's onboard SD card slot.

dataflashNote.message: Flight logs can be recorded to your flight controller's onboard dataflash chip.

dataflashNotPresentNote.message: Your flight controller does not have a compatible dataflash chip available.

dataflashConfirmEraseNote.message: 这将会擦除闪存里面保存的所有黑盒日志。它将耗时20秒左右，确定继续？

dataflashSavingTitle.message: 正在保存闪存数据到文件

dataflashSavingNote.message: 保存闪存数据到文件可能会需要几分钟，请等待。

dataflashSavingNoteAfter.message: 保存成功! 点击 "确认" 继续

dataflashFileWriteFailed.message: 写入文件失败，请确认文件和文件夹权限。

firmwareFlasherReleaseStatusReleaseCandi.message: 重要: 该固件版本当前被标记为候选版本。 请立即报告任何问题

firmwareFlasherTargetWarning.message: 重要: 请选择飞控对应的固件，如果烧写错误的固件将会导致 糟糕的事发生

firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBoardDescript.message: 选择您的主板以查看可用的在线固件版本-选择适合您的主板的正确固件

firmwareFlasherNoRebootDescription.message: 如果你的飞控已经处于boot模式下则启用这个选项。比如你在插电时已经短接了飞控的boot引脚或者按住了boot按钮

firmwareFlasherFlashOnConnect.message: 当飞控连接时自动烧录固件

firmwareFlasherFlashOnConnectDescription.message: 当发现新的串口设备时尝试自动烧录固件

firmwareFlasherFullChipErase.message: 全盘擦除（会丢失所有设置）

firmwareFlasherFullChipEraseDescription.message: 擦除保存在飞控上的所有设置

firmwareFlasherFlashDevelopmentFirmwareD.message: 烧录最新（没有经过测试）的固件

firmwareFlasherManualBaudDescription.message:
如果飞控不支持默认的波特率，或者要通过蓝牙模块来烧录，可以手动设置波特率。
注意： USB DFU 烧录时该选项无效

firmwareFlasherShowDevelopmentReleasesDe.message: 除了稳定的版本外, 还显示候选版本

firmwareFlasherUrl.message: 打开 GitHub 查看该提交…

firmwareFlasherWarningText.message:
请不要尝试烧写INAV configurator 不支持的飞控板
烧写固件过程中千万 不要 断开连接 或关闭电脑

注意: STM32 的 bootloader 储存在ROM中，所以不会有变砖可能
注意: 在固件烧写页面自动连接 会被自动禁用
注意：烧写固件可能会清空设置，请务必先备份好你的数据
注意：如果烧写遇到问题尝试拔掉连接到飞控的所有连线
注意：然后尝试重启，更新配置程序，升级驱动 ，当使用虚拟USB（SPRacingF3Mini, Sparky, ColibriRace, etc）的飞控（大多数新的飞控都是），请仔细阅读 INAV 手册 USB flashing 部分章节，并确保驱动和软件已正确安装。

firmwareFlasherRecoveryText.message:
如果飞控板失去通信，你可以按照以下的几个步骤来恢复:
  • 关闭电源
  • 打开'无重启序列'，打开'擦除整个芯片'选项.
  • 短接 BOOT 引脚，或者按住 BOOT 按键.
  • 上电(如果操作正确，飞控的“活动”灯不会闪烁).
  • 如果需要请安装 STM32 驱动和 Zadig (参阅 USB Flashing section of INAV manual).
  • 关闭软件, 关闭所有 Chrome 应用，然后重新启动软件
  • 释放 BOOT 按键（如有）
  • 烧写正确的固件(参照飞控厂商制定的波特率)
  • 断电
  • 移除 BOOT 引脚的短接
  • 上电(飞控“活动”灯应该会闪烁)
  • 正常连接

firmwareFlasherRemoteFirmwareLoaded.message: 固件加载成功，可供烧录

ledStripHelp.message:
飞控可以控制 LED 灯带上的每一个灯珠的颜色和效果。
配置灯珠的位置，连线的顺序，然后按位置将灯带接入。没有设置过接线顺序的灯珠设置不会被保存。
在一个颜色上双击可编辑 HSV 值。

ledStripModesOrientationTitle.message: LED 方向（“模式和方向”）和颜色

ledStripWiringMessage.message: 没有布线序号的 LED 不会被保存。

pidTuningLevelHelp.message: 以下值会改变自稳模式和半自稳模式下的行为表现。不同的 PID 控制器对该值的要求数值会不一样。具体请参阅文档。

configHelp2.message: 任意角度（直立，反转，旋转等）安装飞控板。当使用外部传感器时，请使用传感器校正设置(陀螺，加速度计，磁场计)来决定独立于飞控板的传感器位置。

failsafeFeaturesHelpOld.message: 失控保护功能已发生很大变化。 使用最新的INAV

failsafeFeatureItemOld.message: RX信号丢失的失控保护设置

failsafeFeaturesHelpNew.message:
失控保护有两个阶段。若飞控在任一接收通道收到无效的脉冲长度，或者接收机汇报已失控，或者彻底没有收到接收机信号，飞控将进入一阶失控保护状态。飞控将会在所有通道使用预置通道设置，如果短时间内信号恢复将可退出失控保护状态。若飞机处于解锁状态，并且一阶失控保护模式持续时间超过了预设的时间，飞控将进入二价失控保护状态，所有通道将会保持当前输出。
注意： 在飞控进入一阶失控保护之前，如果AUX 通道出现无效的脉冲，该通道一样会使用预置通道设置。

failsafePulsrangeHelp.message: 脉冲长度小于最小，或者超过最大，都会被认为是无效脉冲。将会触发单个通道的预置设置覆盖，或引起一阶失控保护。

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHelp.message: 当进入一阶失控保护时，这些设置将会应用于单独无效的AUX 通道，或者是所有通道。注意：数值应是25us的整数倍，小于25us的设置会被上下取整。

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsAuto.message: 自动 指的是 横滚、俯仰、方向都回中，油门最低。 保持 指的是 所有通道保持最后从接收机接收到的有效的数值。

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHold.message: 保持指的是 所有通道保持最后接收到的有效的数值。设置 指的是 通道使用在这里设定的值。

failsafeStageTwoSettingsTitle.message: 二阶失控保护 - 设置

failsafeFeatureHelp.message: 注意：如果停用第二阶段，则会使用后备设置自动 代替所有飞行通道（滚动，俯仰，偏航和油门）的用户设置。

failsafeDelayItem.message: 触发二阶失控保护的信号丢失保护时间[1 = 0.1 秒]

failsafeDelayHelp.message: 一阶失控保护等待信号恢复时间

failsafeOffDelayItem.message: 失控保护过程中关闭电机延时 [1 = 0.1 秒]

failsafeOffDelayHelp.message: 暂时保持在降落模式而不锁定电机的时间

failsafeKillSwitchItem.message: 失控保护开关 （在模式页面设置失控保护模式）

failsafeKillSwitchHelp.message: 设置这个选项会使失控保护开关(模式页面设置)作为直接关闭开关，将会绕开所有的失控保护检测程序。注意： 当打开失控保护开关时，解锁开关无效

failsafeUseMinimumDistanceItem.message: 靠近家时，请使用备用的最小距离故障保护程序

failsafeUseMinimumDistanceHelp.message: Set this option if you need an alternate failsafe behavior when the craft is close to Home. For example the author of the feature has a plane that failsafes when the wings detach on landing, when the RTH failsafe behavior normally desired in flight is no longer wanted or needed.

failsafeMinDistanceItem.message: 失控保护最小距离，以厘米为单位

failsafeMinDistanceHelp.message: 当其在0到离家的最小距离（以厘米为单位）之间时，飞行器将使用备用故障保护行为。 例如，如果设置为2000厘米（20米），并且飞行器高度为13米，则将遵循“故障安全最小距离程序”。 当飞行器位于25米处时，将遵循正常的故障保护程序。 如果设置为0，将始终使用正常的故障保护过程。

failsafeMinDistanceProcedureItem.message: 失控保护最小距离程序

failsafeMinDistanceProcedureHelp.message: 当飞机距离失控保护最小离家距离较近时，将执行此故障安全程序。

escProtocolHelp.message: 电调必须支持所选的协议。 仅当您知道ESC支持时才进行更改！

escRefreshRatelHelp.message: 电调必须支持刷新率。 仅当您知道ESC支持时才进行更改！

servoRefreshRatelHelp.message: 舵机必须支持刷新率。 仅在知道舵机支持的情况下进行更改。 刷新率过高可能会损坏伺服！

logPwmOutputDisabled.message: PWM输出被禁用。 电机和舵机将无法工作。 使用 <u>输出</u> 标签启用！

configurationGyroLpfTitle.message: 陀螺仪低通滤波器截止频率

yawJumpPreventionLimitHelp.message: Prevent yaw jumps during yaw stops and rapid YAW input. To disable set to 500. Adjust this if your aircraft 'skids out'. Higher values increases YAW authority but can cause roll/pitch instability in case of underpowered UAVs. Lower values makes yaw adjustments more gentle but can cause UAV unable to keep heading

yawPLimitHelp.message: Limiter for yaw P term. Increasing it improves yaw authority but can cause instability on ROLL and PITCH.

gyroLpfCutoffFrequencyHelp.message: Software-based filter to remove mechanical vibrations from the gyro signal. Value is cutoff frequency (Hz). For larger frames with bigger props set to lower value. Too high value can cause motor and ESC overheating.

accLpfCutoffFrequencyHelp.message: Software-based filter to remove mechanical vibrations from the accelerometer measurements. Value is cutoff frequency (Hz). For larger frames with bigger props set to lower value.

dtermLpfCutoffFrequencyHelp.message: Lowpass cutoff filter for Dterm for all PID controllers

rollPitchItermIgnoreRateHelp.message: PID I-Term is ignored above this rotation rate. This prevents I-term from accumulation during maneuvers

yawItermIgnoreRateHelp.message: PID I-Term is ignored above this rotation rate. This prevents I-term from accumulation during maneuvers

axisAccelerationLimitRollPitchHelp.message: This is maximum angular acceleration rate pilot is allowed to require from UAV. UAV should be able to satisfy this accelaration rate. As a rule of thumb, the bigger the UAV, to lower acceleration it can handle

axisAccelerationLimitYawHelp.message: This is maximum angular acceleration rate pilot is allowed to require from UAV. UAV should be able to satisfy this accelaration rate. As a rule of thumb, the bigger the UAV, to lower acceleration it can handle

pidTuningTPAHelp.message: Throttle PID Attenuation factor. PID gains will be reduced lineary starting from 0 at TPA Breakpoint (Throttle) to TPA factor at max throttle

pidTuningTPABreakPointHelp.message: Throttle PID Attenuation begins when Throttle position exceeds this value.

configurationGyroLpfHelp.message: 基于硬件的陀螺仪截止频率。 通常值越大越好，但会使无人机对振动更敏感

configurationGyroFrequencyHelp.message: In general, higher value is better but makes UAV more sensitive to vibrations. Should be kept above 'Flight Controller Loop Time' frequency. Maximal practical value is hardware dependant. If set too high, board might not run properly. Observe CPU usage.

configurationAccelerometerFrequencyHelp.message: For Acro purposes, this value can be lowered from default

configurationAttitudeFrequencyHelp.message: For Acro purposes, this value can be lowered from default

configurationLoopTimeHelp.message: In general, higher value is better. With asynchronous gyroscope, should be kept below gyro update frequency. Maximal practical value is hardware dependant. If set too high, board might not run properly. Observe CPU usage.

OpflowCalText.message: 按下按钮后，您有30秒钟的时间将飞机保持在空中并将其倾斜到侧面而无需水平移动。 请注意，光学流量传感器需要始终观察表面。

NoteCalibration.message: 注意：如果将飞行控制器以其他角度或倒置安装，请按照飞行控制器指向的方向执行校准步骤，如图所示，而不是四边形（否则校准将不起作用）.

MagCalText.message: 按下按钮后，您有30秒钟的时间将飞机保持在空中并旋转，以使每一侧（正面，背面，左侧，右侧，顶部和底部）指向地面。

LevCalText.message: 请在此处输入一些文字...

presetApplyDescription.message:
Make sure that mixer was configured before applying any Presets!

Preset overwrites selected configuration values including mixer, filtering, PIDs and other. Settings like: flight modes, radio settings, failsafe and OSD are not changed. Applied values should NOT treated as final values, but entry points for final tuning.
Always check new configuration before flying!

accCalibrationStartBody.message: 将飞行控制器放置在如图所示的位置，然后再次按<strong> 校准 </ strong>按钮。 重复6个位置。 校准期间保持稳定

accCalibrationStopBody.message: 加速度计校准完成，检查是否已保存值

gyroNotchCutoff1.message: First gyro notch filter cutoff freq.

gyroNotchCutoff2.message: Second gyro notch filter cutoff freq.

gyroNotchHz1Help.message:
Should be tuned to propeller harmonic frequency. Usually equals [motor_frequency] * [propeller_blades_number]

Has to be above cutoff frequency

0 disables the filter

gyroNotchHz2Help.message:
Should be tuned to motor frequency.

Has to be above cutoff frequency and below first gyro notch filter frequency.

0 disables the filter

gyroNotchCutoff1Help.message:
Defines band of notch filter.

Has to be kept below notch filter frequency.

gyroNotchCutoff2Help.message:
Defines band of notch filter.

Has to be kept below notch filter frequency.

dtermNotchHzHelp.message:
Should be placed between first and second gyro notch filter frequency

Has to be above cutoff frequency

0 disables the filter

dtermNotchCutoffHelp.message:
Defines band of filter.

Has to be kept below notch filter frequency.

posholdMaxClimbRate.message: 最大导航爬升率 [厘米/秒]

posholdMaxManualClimbRate.message: 最大定高上升速率[厘米/秒]

posholdMaxBankAngleHelp.message: Maximum banking angle in navigation modes. Constrained by maximum ROLL angle in PID tuning tab.

posholdHoverMidThrottle.message: 使用油门中点保持定高

positionEstimatorConfigurationDisclaimer.message: This value should be changed very carefully. In most cases there is not need to change that. For advanced users only!

gps_min_sats.message: Min. GPS satellites for a valid fix

w_z_baro_p_help.message: When this value is set to 0, barometer is not used for altitude computation

w_z_gos_p_help.message: When this value is set to 0, GPS is not used for altitude computation

minRthDistanceHelp.message: 如果无人机在离原点的距离内，它将降落而不是返航，然后降落

rthClimbIgnoreEmergency.message: Climb regardless of position sensors health

rthAbortThresholdHelp.message: RTH sanity checking feature will notice if the distance to home is increasing during RTH and if it exceeds the threshold defined by this parameter, instead of continuing RTH the UAV will enter emergency landing. Default is 500m which is safe enough for both multirotors and airplanes.

rthAltitudeHelp.message: Used in Extra, Fixed and 'At Least' RTH altitude modes

landSlowdownMinAlt.message: Min. vertical landing speed at altitude [cm]

landSlowdownMaxAlt.message: Vertical landing speed slowdown at altitude [cm]

maxBankAngleHelp.message: Maximum banking angle in navigation modes. Constrained by maximum ROLL angle in PID tuning tab.

maxClimbAngleHelp.message: 导航模式下的最大爬升角度。 在”PID调参“页面中受最大俯仰角限制。

maxDiveAngleHelp.message: 导航模式下的最大俯仰角。 在”PID调参“页面中受最大俯仰角限制.

pitchToThrottleHelp.message: In navigation modes, each degree of climb will add this many units to the cruise throttle. Conversely, each degree of diving will substract from it.

osdUnitUKTip.message: Use metric units except for the speed, which is displayed in miles per hour.

osdAlarmBATT_CAP_HELP.message: The battery capacity used indicator (mah drawn) will flash when the total consumed mah are greater than this value. Requires a current sensor. Zero disables this alarm.

osdAlarmDIST_HELP.message: 当距离大于此值时，“到达原点的距离”指示灯将闪烁。 0禁用此警报。

osdAlarmMAX_NEG_ALTITUDE_HELP.message: The altitude indicator will flash when altitude is negative and its absolute value is greater than this alarm. Useful when taking off from elevated places. Zero disables this alarm.

osdAlarmGFORCE_HELP.message: The g force element will start blinking when greater than this value

osdAlarmGFORCE_AXIS_MIN_HELP.message: The axes g force elements will start blinking when lower than this value

osdAlarmGFORCE_AXIS_MAX_HELP.message: The axes g force elements will start blinking when greater than this value

osdAlarmCURRENT_HELP.message: The current draw element will start blinking when the consumption is greater than this value. Zero disables this alarm.

osdGroupMapsAndRadars_HELP.message: 只要地图和雷达不与预览中可见的任何地图部分重叠，地图和雷达便可以在其上方布置其他元素。

osdElement_RSSI_VALUE_HELP.message: Shows the quality of the signal received from the RC radio (the higher the better).

osdElement_SAG_COMP_MAIN_BATT_VOLTAGE_HE.message: Calculated voltage the battery should be at without load (simulates ideal battery)

osdElement_MESSAGES_HELP.message: 显示不同的系统消息，例如警告，硬件故障和当前飞行模式的扩展详细信息（例如AUTOTUNE和AUTOTRIM模式以及RTH阶段）。

osdElement_SAG_COMP_MAIN_BATT_CELL_VOLTA.message: 计算出的电池应在空载下的平均电池电压（模拟理想电池）

osdElement_REMAINING_FLIGHT_TIME_HELP.message: 根据剩余电池电量，平均功率和到家的距离，估计飞机需要返回家园之前的剩余飞行时间（仅固定翼，请阅读文档）

osdElement_REMAINING_FLIGHT_DISTANCE_HEL.message: 根据剩余电池电量，平均功率和到家的距离，估计飞机需要返回家园之前的剩余飞行行程距离（仅固定翼，请阅读文档）

osdElement_MAIN_BATT_CELL_VOLTAGE_HELP.message: Shows the average cell voltage from the main battery

osdElement_THROTTLE_POSITION_AUTO_THR.message: 油门位置 / 自动油门

osdElement_THROTTLE_POSITION_AUTO_THR_HE.message: 在飞行模式中显示油门杆位置，在此位置它控制油门输出。 在导航模式下，它显示应用于电动机的实际油门值。

osdElement_3D_SPEED_HELP.message: Shows 3D speed considering both horizontal and vertical speed.

osdElement_GPS_SATS_HELP.message: Shows the number of GPS satellites located by the GPS receiver.

osdElement_GPS_HDOP_HELP.message: 显示GPS的水平精度稀释。 越低，GPS定位越准确

osdElement_PLUS_CODE_HELP.message: Plus codes encode both latitude and longitude on a single value that can be entered directly in Google Maps. It provides the same level of precision than latitude and longitude while using less screen space.

osdElement_VARIO_HELP.message: Shows vertical speed using up or down arrows. Each arrow represents 10cm (~4 inches) per second.

osdElement_VARIO_NUM_HELP.message: Shows vertical speed using a number

osdElement_G_FORCE_HELP.message: Shows the g force taking into account all axes

osdElement_G_FORCE_X.message: Longitudinal g force in body frame (X)

osdElement_G_FORCE_X_HELP.message: Shows the g force in the X axis (longitudinal)

osdElement_G_FORCE_Y.message: Lateral g force in body frame (Y)

osdElement_G_FORCE_Y_HELP.message: Shows the g force in the Y axis (lateral)

osdElement_G_FORCE_Z.message: Vertical g force in body frame (Z)

osdElement_G_FORCE_Z_HELP.message: Shows the g force in the Z axis (vertical)

osdElement_ONTIME_FLYTIME_HELP.message: Shows "On Time" while unarmed and "Fly Time" while armed.

osdElement_RTC_TIME_HELP.message: Shows the current time, as retrieved from the GPS or set via the radio.

osdElement_RC_SOURCE_HELP.message: Shows the current RC source, STD or MSP (useful when using MSP override)

osdElement_VTX_POWER_HELP.message: Shows the current VTX power level. Blinks when the corresponding RC adjustment is selected

osdElement_VTX_CHANNEL_HELP.message: Shows the current band and channel of the VTX. Requires either a VTX with SmartAudio or Tramp or either a VTX integrated in the flight controller.

osdElement_MAP_SCALE_HELP.message: Scale of the currently shown map/radar.

osdElement_MAP_REFERENCE_HELP.message: Reference (direction that points up) of the current map. N for North and T for takeoff direction.

osdElement_WIND_SPEED_HORIZONTAL_HELP.message: 显示估计的水平风速和风向

osdElement_WIND_SPEED_VERTICAL_HELP.message: Shows estimated vertical wind speed and direction (up or down).

osdElement_MC_VEL_X_PID_OUTPUTS.message: MC Velocity X PID controller outputs

osdElement_MC_VEL_Y_PID_OUTPUTS.message: MC Velocity Y PID controller outputs

osdElement_MC_VEL_Z_PID_OUTPUTS.message: MC Velocity Z PID controller outputs

osdElement_MC_POS_XYZ_P_OUTPUTS.message: MC Position XYZ P controllers outputs

appUpdateNotificationDescription.message: 请访问网站阅读发布说明和下载

useOnlyStandalone.message:
使用独立程序
请访问网站阅读发布说明和下载

confirm_delete_all_points.message: 您真的要删除所有点吗？

mixerApplyDescription.message: This action overrides all current mixer settings and replaces them with default values. There is no 'Undo' option!

fcFirmwareUpdateRequired.message: 飞行控制器固件必须更新为最新版本才能使用此功能

mixerNotConfigured.message: 混控未配置。使用 <u>混控</u> 页面进行设置!

confirm_reset_settings.message:
您真的要重设所有设置吗？
注意：所有设置都会丢失！ 完成此操作后，您必须设置整个飞机！

brakingSpeedThresholdTip.message: Braking will be enabled only if actual speed if higher than threshold

brakingDisengageSpeedTip.message: Braking will end when speed goes below this value

brakingTimeoutTip.message: Safety measure. This is the longest period of time braking can be active.

brakingBoostFactorTip.message: Defines how strong the braking boost will be. 100% means the navigation engine is allowed to double the banking speed and acceleration

brakingBoostTimeoutTip.message: Safety measure. This is the longest period of time braking boost can be active.

brakingBoostSpeedThresholdTip.message: Braking boost will be enabled only if actual speed if higher than threshold

brakingBoostDisengageSpeedTip.message: Braking boost will end when speed goes below this value

brakingBankAngleTip.message: 制动阶段允许的最大倾斜角度

accNotchHzHelp.message: Allow to set a single notch filter for accelerometer readout. Should be configured in the same way as gyro notch if accelerometer records a noise spike above acc. LPF filter

accNotchCutoffHelp.message: Should be kept below acc. notch filter frequency

gyroStage2LpfCutoffFrequencyHelp.message: Second stage gyro low pass filter that is an equivalent of Betaflight not-Kalman stage2 filter. It has to be setup above first stage gyro LPF. For 5 and 6-inch miniquads, this usually means above 150Hz. 7-inch quads above 125Hz.

escProtocolNotAdvised.message: 建议不要使用此电调协议，使用风险自负

escProtocolExperimental.message: 实验性的电调协议，使用风险自负

looptimeNotAdvised.message: 如果你正在使用GPS，则PID回路可能不稳定

gyroLpfSuggestedMessage.message: 对于螺旋桨尺寸小于8英寸的所有多旋翼，建议使用此设置。 第一次飞行后请务必检查电动机温度

gyroLpfNotAdvisedMessage.message: 建议选择更高的截止频率

gyroLpfNotFlyableMessage.message: 此设置可能会使无人机无法飞行

gyroLpfWhyNotHigherMessage.message: 如果电机没有过热，请尝试设置256Hz

gyroLpfWhyNotSlightlyHigherMessage.message: 如果没有振动问题并且电动机没有过热，请尝试设置188Hz

itermRelaxHelp.message: Defines Iterm relaxation algorithm activation. PR mean it's active on Roll and Pitch axis. PRY is active also on Yaw.

itermRelaxTypeHelp.message: GYRO mode is more clinical and complete in suppressing iTerm, SETPOINT mode is a bit smoother with slightly softer landings after flips.

itermRelaxCutoffHelp.message: Lower values open a longer time window for Iterm Relax to work on and stronger Iterm suppression. Higher values shortens the time windows and reduces suppression.

gyro_lpf_type_help.message: BIQUAD offers better noise attenuation for a price of higher delay. PT1 has lower attenuation but offers lower delay.

gyro_stage2_lowpass_type_help.message: BIQUAD offers better noise attenuation for a price of higher delay. PT1 has lower attenuation but offers lower delay.

dterm_lpf_type_help.message: BIQUAD offers better noise attenuation for a price of higher delay. PT1 has lower attenuation but offers lower delay.

dterm_lpf2_type_help.message: BIQUAD offers better noise attenuation for a price of higher delay. PT1 has lower attenuation but offers lower delay.

dterm_lpf2_hz_help.message: Lowpass cutoff filter for D-term on ROLL and PITCH axises. 0 mean filter is disabled

acc_lpf_type_help.message: BIQUAD offers better noise attenuation for a price of higher delay. PT1 has lower attenuation but offers lower delay.

d_boost_factor_help.message: Defines the maximum Dterm boost when maximum angular acceleration is reached. 1.0 means D-Boost is disabled, 2.0 means Dterm is allowed to grow by 100%. Values between 1.5 and 1.7 are usually the sweet spot.

d_boost_max_at_acceleration_help.message: D-Boost is fully active when angular acceleration (either detected by gyro or rate target) reached given acceleration. Between 0 and this value, D-Boost factor is scaled lineary

d_boost_gyro_delta_lpf_hz_help.message: Should be set to the frequency of propeller wash oscillations. 5-inch quads work best at around 80Hz, 7-inch quads at around 50Hz

mc_airmode_type_help.message:
Defines the Airmode state handling type for Multirotors.
Default STICK_CENTER is the classical approach in which Airmode is always active if enabled, but when the throttle is low and ROLL/PITCH/YAW sticks are centered, Iterms is not allowed to grow (ANTI_WINDUP).
THROTTLE_THRESHOLD is the Airmode behavior known from Betaflight. In this mode, Airmode is active as soon THROTTLE position is above mc_airmode_threshold and stays active until disarm. ANTI_WINDUP is never triggered. For small Multirotors (up to 7-inch propellers) it is suggested to switch to THROTTLE_THRESHOLD since it keeps full stabilization no matter what pilot does with the sticks. Fixed Wings always use STICK_CENTER mode.

mc_airmode_threshold_help.message: Defines airmode THROTTLE activation threshold when mc_airmode_type THROTTLE_THRESHOLD is used

vtxDisclaimer.message: Use only bands, channels and power levels that are legal in a place you fly! Always refer to VTX user manual and local regulations!

defaultsDialogInfo.message: INAV Configurator想知道您正在配置哪种无人机。 根据此信息，它将修改一些默认值以解锁最佳飞行性能。

defaultsDialogInfo2.message: 避免盲目地从先前版本的INAV恢复所有PID和过滤器配置。 通过从默认值重新调整参数可以获得最佳结果！

throttleIdleDigitalInfo.message: 对于数字协议，无需将电机停在空中，怠速可以降低至5-7％。 如果将油门拉至较低位置后无人驾驶飞机摇晃，请尝试增加怠速来消除这种现象。

throttleIdleAnalogInfo.message: 对于模拟协议，如果电动机平稳运行而不会卡死，则怠速可以降低到10％以下。 如果将油门拉至较低位置后无人驾驶飞机摇晃，请尝试增加怠速来消除这种现象。

motorStopWarning.message: 应该在飞机，漫游者和船上启用。 不应在多旋翼上启用！ 在多旋翼上，如果启用了Airmode，则电动机不会停止。

dynamic_gyro_notch_enabled_help.message: 矩阵陀螺仪滤波器是INAV中可用的新一代动态陀螺仪陷波器。 建议在F4和F7飞行控制器的所有多旋翼版本上启用它。

configurationI2cSpeedHelp.message: I2C速度应保持在最高水平，以允许所有连接的设备正常工作。 默认值为400kHz是一个保存值，如果是多旋翼，建议将其切换为800kHz。

i2cSpeedSuggested800khz.message: 如果连接的硬件允许，请切换到800kHz

defaultsQuadTitle.message: 迷你四轴飞行器，3“-7”螺旋桨

defaultsAirplaneWithoutaTailTitle.message: 无尾翼(机翼、三角翼等)的飞机

defaultsCustomUAVTitle.message: 自定义无人机- INAV遗留默认值(不推荐)
